pullrequest.title: Add DoubleSpinBox Template for grid GUI

content.raw:
> I think v1.4 spinbox takes real value

Oh you're right, I hadn't realized that!

> I used v2.1 due to the assumption that we would want the latest support.

I know, right? The new spin box feels like a regression to me. Luckily we can still use the old one.

> Do you think I should close this PR, or try to merge it as an example of v2.1 custom spinbox? 

How about we close this one so we don't encourage users to combine different styles?
content.html:
I think v1.4 spinbox takes real value

Oh you're right, I hadn't realized that!

I used v2.1 due to the assumption that we would want the latest support.

I know, right? The new spin box feels like a regression to me. Luckily we can still use the old one.

Do you think I should close this PR, or try to merge it as an example of v2.1 custom spinbox?

How about we close this one so we don't encourage users to combine different styles?
